name: WP Voice Recorder
author: Kumar Parth

sections.description:
WP Voice Recorder can help us to record the posts and play them in the front end. It allows us to save the recorded audios into your uploads folder in wordpress install.

Usage

  1. Download and extract wp-voice-recorder.zip to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. It will create a recorder in each posts editor and there you can record your voice and publish or update your posts.

Special Thanks to
Sajith Amma for making jRecorder.
and Mark J Panaghiston for making jPlayer

If you have any suggestions for a new plugin, feel free to email me at parthbhushan2@gmail.com
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract wp-voice-recorder.zip to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. It will create a recorder in each posts editor and there you can record your voice and publish or update your posts.
sections.changelog:
1.1 – Removed the dropbox account feature.

Version 1.1

  • Fixed the missing files issue
